name: iSoluce
description: iSoluce is a web agency. We are experts in all things related to the web and provide several services in the areas of web and income generation on the internet. Our 4 main competence centers are custom web & mobile development, web marketing, research & business intelligence as well as business auditing & strategy.

locations.address: 45 Rue Frédéric Joliot Curie Marseille Innovation - Bureau 216 ,
